newsitem.title: USA: Broadway & Seymour to sell Corbel unit.
newsitem.headline: Broadway & Seymour to sell Corbel unit.

text.p: Broadway & Seymour Inc said on Friday that it had signed a letter of intent for SunGard Data Systems Inc to acquire Broadway's wholly owned subsidiary Corbel & Co.
Terms of the deal were not disclosed.

The company said that the National Pension Alliance (NPA) program associated with Corbel will not be purchased by SunGard. NPA will be discontinued due to continuing losses and no near term likelihood of profitibality, the company said.
The company said the transaction is expected to be completed within 30 days, subject to regulatory and board approvals, and the negotiation of a definitive stock purchase agreement.
Corbel provides PC-based document creation and pension administration software, serving the small plan market.

Alan Stanford, president and chief executive officer of Broadway & Seymour said in a statement that the deal completed the company's year-long effort to divest non-core businesses and to focus on core business.
